pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 26, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

New York, New York

8:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President of the Republic of Chile Sebastián Piñera and Prime Minister of New Zealand Jacinda Ardern.

Alvin Room, Conference Level
Grand Hyatt New York Hotel
109 East 42nd Street

Notes for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Press Conference Room S-0237
Secretariat Building
United Nations Headquarters

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
